title: Kothon
description: The so-called "Kothon" is a large, rectangular, artificial pool dating to the Punic period of Sicily and located on the island of Motya. Originally interpreted as an artificial port basin, recent research reinterpets it as a freshwater basin with functions sacred to the god Ba'al and constituting the central component of a large sanctuary.

properties.description: an artificial basin of the Punic phase; verified in Google Earth 2013
properties.title: Imagery location of Kothon
